about-me-page-paragraph-one: Software developer based in Montreal, currently studying Computer Programming at Lasalle College. Proficient in Python, Java, C#, JS, HTML, CSS, and knowledgeable in databases such as MySQL, MongoDB, and Sql server.
about-me-page-paragraph-two: In Brazil, I served as a lieutenant in the Brazilian Army for 4 years, acquiring skills in teamwork, problem-solving, effective communication, leadership, time management, conflict resolution, critical thinking, and adaptability.
about-me-page-paragraph-three: I'm committed to applying a disciplined approach and my technical skills to excel in software development. Open to connecting and collaborating on impactful projects.
page-projects-machine-learning: AI models using multiple and linear regression.
page-projects-ios-app: iOS application for French verb conjugation.
